channel.title: SRAM' overflowed / CCMSRAM' overflowed
channel.description: Hi, so I have built me a Sequencer-Track, with some goodies (2x LFOs, EQ, EFX, etc). when I start the patch without the EFX-section, it runs with 17% .. but when I insert my efx-subpatch I run out of memory > C:\Users\ADMINA~1\DOCUME~1\axoloti/build/xpatch.elf > c:/program files (x86)/axoloti_runtime/platform_win/bin/../lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/4.9.3/../../../../arm-none-eabi/bin/ld.exe: C:\Users\ADMINA~1\DOCUME~1\axoloti/build/xpatch.elf section `.text._ZN5rootc3dspEv' will not fit in region `SRAM' > c:/program files (x86)/axoloti_runtime/platform_win/bin/../lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/4.9.3/../../../../arm-none-eabi/bin/ld.exe: C:\Users\ADMINA~1\DOCUME~1\axoloti/build/xpatch.elf section `.bss' will not fit in region `CCMSRAM' > c:/program files (x86)/axoloti_runtime/platform_win/bin/../lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/4.9.3/../../../../arm-none-eabi/bin/ld.exe: region `SRAM' overflowed by 17268 bytes > c:/program files (x86)/axoloti_runtime/platform_win/bin/../lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/4.9.3/../../../../arm-none-eabi/bin/ld.exe: region `CCMSRAM' overflowed by 5080 bytes Originally I wanted to create a 16-track Sequencer. But now I come to limitations with only one Track. How can I save memory?

item.title: SRAM' overflowed / CCMSRAM' overflowed
item.dc:creator: @AdmiralCrunch
item.description:
@AdmiralCrunch wrote:

tanks
will check it out

Read full topic

item.title: SRAM' overflowed / CCMSRAM' overflowed
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

Reduce the "number of presets", "entries per preset", "Maximum number of modulation sources", "Maximum number of modulation targets" of the subpatches, potentially to zero - in the patch settings dialog.

Using precious resources User Guide
Overview The axoloti board is a powerful board, but like everything it has only a finite amount of memory and processing power. The good news is axoloti is also very flexible, so there are lots of ways to get to similar results! Here are some tips about how to best make use of the resources it has. Memory SRAM is very precious on the Axoloti (used by table/write delay/write) , there is much more SDRAM available, use SDRAM alternatives of objects where possible (usually have sdram in theâ€¦

Read full topic

item.title: SRAM' overflowed / CCMSRAM' overflowed
item.dc:creator: @AdmiralCrunch
item.description:
@AdmiralCrunch wrote:

Hi,

so I have built me a Sequencer-Track, with some goodies (2x LFOs, EQ, EFX, etc).

aaaa.jpg1656x926 809 KB

when I start the patch without the EFX-section, it runs with 17% .. but when I insert my efx-subpatch I run out of memory

C:\Users\ADMINA~1\DOCUME~1\axoloti/build/xpatch.elf
c:/program files (x86)/axoloti_runtime/platform_win/bin/../lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/4.9.3/../../../../arm-none-eabi/bin/ld.exe: C:\Users\ADMINA~1\DOCUME~1\axoloti/build/xpatch.elf section .text._ZN5rootc3dspEv' will not fit in regionSRAM'
c:/program files (x86)/axoloti_runtime/platform_win/bin/../lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/4.9.3/../../../../arm-none-eabi/bin/ld.exe: C:\Users\ADMINA~1\DOCUME~1\axoloti/build/xpatch.elf section .bss' will not fit in regionCCMSRAM'
c:/program files (x86)/axoloti_runtime/platform_win/bin/../lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/4.9.3/../../../../arm-none-eabi/bin/ld.exe: region SRAM' overflowed by 17268 bytes
c:/program files (x86)/axoloti_runtime/platform_win/bin/../lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/4.9.3/../../../../arm-none-eabi/bin/ld.exe: regionCCMSRAM' overflowed by 5080 bytes

Originally I wanted to create a 16-track Sequencer. But now I come to limitations with only one Track. How can I save memory?
